explosiveenhancement.title: Explosive Enhancement Config
explosiveenhancement.underwater.blast.to: A large blue-ish horizontal circle, similar to the blastwave particle
explosiveenhancement.underwater.bubbleam: §cWarning§r: Too many bubbles may cause lag!
explosiveenhancement.dynamicexplosions.e: Change the size of an explosion depending on its power
explosiveenhancement.dynamicunderwater.e: Change the size of an underwater explosion depending on its power
Should there be a special effect for underwater explosions? If disabled, the explosion will look identical to the explosion settings set above this option. If enabled, the explosion will use the options beneath this option, so long as the option is in the underwater explosions group
explosiveenhancement.yoffset.tooltip: The y offset for small explosions
explosiveenhancement.extras.alwaysshow.t: If enabled, the explosion particles will attempt to render from further away(roughly twice as far) AND on lower particle settings. Use wisely!
explosiveenhancement.underwater.sparks.s: Controls the size of the sparks particle
explosiveenhancement.sparks.opacity.tool: Controls the opacity of the sparks particle
explosiveenhancement.underwater.bubbleam: Little bubbles that pop after some time
explosiveenhancement.sparks.enabled.tool: Dramatic white lines that come as a result of the explosion
explosiveenhancement.sparks.size.tooltip: Controls the size of the sparks particle
explosiveenhancement.mushroomcloud.enabl: Smoke that is in the shape of a mushroom
explosiveenhancement.underwater.shockwav: A vertical circle with a hint of blue, similar to the fireball particle
explosiveenhancement.underwater.sparks.o: Controls the opacity of the sparks particle
explosiveenhancement.extras.emissivewate: Should the underwater explosions be emissive?
explosiveenhancement.extras.emissive.too: Should the normal explosions be emissive?
explosiveenhancement.underwater.sparks.t: Dramatic white lines that come as a result of the explosion
explosiveenhancement.bettersmallexplosio: If an explosion's power is equal to 1(wither skull, ghast fireball), the explosion's y coordinate will be lowered by a small amount for a sometimes better looking effect
explosiveenhancement.extras.logs.tooltip: Extra console logs to help debug, if needed
explosiveenhancement.blastwave.enabled.t: A large orange, horizontal circle that lies flat on the ground
